thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
blood generating stem cells (in bone marrow)
mesenchymal stem cell MSC (in cell biology)
pinyin: jian1 chong1 zhi4 gan4 xi4 bao1

sentences.english: is that the, like the best stem cells come from human embryos.
sentences.chinese: 是因为最好的干细胞来自于人类的胚胎。

sentences.english: Results Many BMSCs of rats were gained from the euhure in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 结果体外培养获得大量的大鼠骨髓基质干细胞。

sentences.english: I feel these cells are pluripotent like human embryonic stem cells.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉这些细胞像人胚胎干细胞一样是多能的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate whether fetal bone marrow stromal cells have hemang ioblastic characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究骨髓基质中是否具有血液血管干细胞的特征。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the status of tumor stem cells study in solid tumors .
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍肿瘤干细胞在实体肿瘤中的研究进展。

sentences.english: Research on neural stem cells (NSCs) is one of the current hot-spots in neuroscience.
sentences.chinese: 神经干细胞研究是当前神经科学的热点之一。

sentences.english: Stem cells possess two special properties: self-renewal and potency of multiple differentiations.
sentences.chinese: 干细胞具有自我更新和多分化潜能。

sentences.english: Allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, Allo-HS.
sentences.chinese: 对异基因造血干细胞移植。

sentences.english: Stem cells, on the other hand, are blank slates with the potential to develop in many different ways.
sentences.chinese: 干细胞却像一张白板，有着向各个方向发展的潜能。

sentences.english: We isolated human adipose tissue-derived MSC from four healthy donors.
sentences.chinese: 我们从四个健康的供体分离人脂肪间充质干细胞。

sentences.english: Clon stem cell technique make people pay close attention to the human's fate.
sentences.chinese: 克隆与干细胞的探索使人类强化了对自我命运的关注。

sentences.english: What is dry cell of umbilical blood hematopoiesis?
sentences.chinese: 什么是脐带血造血干细胞？

sentences.english: This is the website for The Institute for Stem Cell Research, The University of Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 这是爱丁堡大学干细胞研究所的网站。

sentences.english: The lack of limbal stem cells results in many abnormalities of ocular surface function.
sentences.chinese: 角膜缘干细胞缺乏将导致各种眼表功能异常。

sentences.english: The stem cells are then collected through a process called apheresis.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我们会采用血液成分分离程序来采集干细胞。

sentences.english: The team is now working on doing the same with human embryonic stem cells.
sentences.chinese: 该团队目前正努力在人体胚胎干细胞上再续成功。
